title: Anyone else not loading into TFT games and losing LP because of RIOT?
body:
Well this has happened about 8 times to me now in RANKED tft. Lost around 600ish lp so far from this too, stopping me from hitting plat multiple times now (Would currently be plat 2 if this bullshit didnt occur constantly). I've put in Multiple tickets but Nothing happens.

Join game like normal. Game loads but doesnt enter me into the loading screen. I wait, get tilted by the fact its a ranked game and wont let me enter, close client then reopen it just to see "game in progress" without any reconnect button or allowing me to rejoin, thus losing a lot of LP in the process. 

Anyone else having this problem and riot completely ignoring you too or?

EDIT: It's currently happening right now for me

replies.body: I just end process tree via Task Manager, i look for the client (The actual game itself), End the Process Tree, gives me the reconnect button on the actual client and it works fine, i miss at most one of the minion rounds, which isn't really an issue, since i don't get anything in them anyways

I had this same issue, found that restarting my PC allowed me to load into game.
We're currently tracking this issue, if you [contact PS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) they'll give you instructions on how to collect logs to help the devs resolve this.
